pages.text: The "Three Goddesses" are the original three Umamusume, the gods who govern the Umamusume. They give the Umamusume soul, power, and knowledge, and show the direction of the Umamusume. ......$(p)For trainers, the greatest significance of the Three Goddesses Statue is the activation of the Faded Umamusume Soul. At the same time, "Factor Inheritance" is also the Three Goddesses Statue.
